Player History
Drafted in 6th round, 89th overall pick, by St. Louis (B) in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/2/2015, off Charles Barney (CHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/10/2015, off Leroy Vega (BOS)...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Boston on 8/10/2015...
10/22/2015: Signed a contract extension with St. Louis (B), $20,000,000 per year, for 3 years.
Drove in 6 runs against New York on 8/1/2016...
Won World Series with St. Louis (B) in 2016...
Injured on 5/19/2017 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/28/2017, hitting .571 with 0 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Gold Glove at Centerfield in 2017...
Injured on 4/22/2018 with a Strained Achilles Tendon, out for one week...
Injured on 6/24/2018 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 10/2/2018 with a Strained Hamstring Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
10/3/2018: Signed a contract extension with St. Louis (B), $7,250,000 per year, for 2 years.
Won Gold Glove at Rightfield in 2018...
